projects: [{"title":"Attendance Management System Project using Open CV","start_date":"Feb 2021","end_date":"Mar 2021","description":"Storing 1 passport image of the person.Using Face Recognition to detect the face on webcam.Validated & marked attendance in Microsoft Excel with timestamp."},{"title":"Analyzing TV Data Project using Exploratory Data Analysis","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Feb 2021","description":"Summarized Statistical Analysis on 3 datasets using NumPy & Pandas.Merged 3 datasets to get insights.Visualized 7 graphs including Histogram, Line Graph etc. using Matplotlib & Seaborn."},{"title":"Bus Ticket Booking Application in Python","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Feb 2020","description":"Added 5-6 basic information details at Signup Page to create User account.Validated 2 inputs, Email Id & Password at Login Page.Main Menu has 4 options: Booking Ticket, Cancel Ticket, Give Feedback & About the Application.Booking section has 3 destinations with 6 buses.Present Bill after a successful booking.Cancel booked seats, using option 3 in Main Menu if required."},{"title":"Banking Project In Python","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Jan 2020","description":"Project starts with a Signup Page where user makes his profile or account by adding basic information.After Signup Page there is Login Page where Email id and Password are validated.After successful login user enters Main Menu where he/she can perform transaction or view balance and information about his account."}]
